fixes.name: Delta Down Fix FX T-1
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR useCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR startDate = SELECTEDVALUE('Start Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    useCustom,
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[MAX_DATE -1day] = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE],
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down Fix FX],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = startDate,
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down Fix FX],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau parameters with SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]) and converted nested IF logic to DAX using VARs for clarity. All field references were converted to 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[ColumnName] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameters ([Parameters].[Use Custom Date] and [Parameters].[Start Date]); per rules, any calculation using parameters must be created as a measure.
